Name: Just Futanari
About the game: Become a couple of futanari and have lovey-dovey, healing time Enjoy yourself in a love hotel as a couple of futanari. Use adult toys on your partner or yourself. Each location has several scenes that you can switch between. Features . * 23 scenes in addition to free H. * Various facilities are available in the love hotel where the game takes place. 　You can choose from 9 types of lighting and 3 types of music. 　Monitors in the bedroom and bath allow you to enjoy slideshows. 　A large mirror is placed and can be moved to any place at any time. * VR controller operation linkage When the hand mode is changed, the girl also moves in conjunction with the controller's shaking motion. * VR controller vibration function Vibrates in accordance with the girl's movement. * Support for electric masturbation hole The girl moves in conjunction with the girl's movement and the movement of the controller. Operation has been confirmed with A10 Cyclone SA. ( This function is currently for PC only. Operation has been confirmed with A10 Cyclone SA. ) * Can make the partner take a free pose. * Can use a dildo or masturbator for you or your partner, or kiss them During the scene where you rub each other, set the animation mode to hand mode and shake the controller. You can play as if you are supposed to be doing it yourself in real life, but in VR it is as if you are doing it with your partner. How to operate . * Normal operation 'Analog stick' Move 'Analog stick + Trigger key' Turn, up/down 'Trigger key' Use 'Grip Keys' Hold 'Tap 1, 2, 3, 4 button' Menu (current) '1, 2, 3, 4 button hold' Menu (Main) * Mirror Move 'Analog stick' Move 'Analog stick + Trigger key' Rotate 'Analog stick + Trigger key + Grip key' Up/Down This software has been developed and tested with MetaQuest2 (Oculus Link) and HTC VIVE. 　Operation may differ on other VR devices. About the operation . * PCVR Meta Quest 2(OculusLink) Operation confirmed on actual device HtcVive Operation confirmed on actual device We have not confirmed the operation in other environments. We hope you will check it by playing the Demo version.
